thread.title: OnlineCheckWriter.com Launches Document Mail App Offering Instant Dispatch
thread.title_full: OnlineCheckWriter.com Launches Document Mail App Offering Instant Dispatch

author: AB Newswire
title: OnlineCheckWriter.com Launches Document Mail App Offering Instant Dispatch
text:
OnlineCheckWriter.com Launches Document Mail App Offering Instant Dispatch By: AB Newswire September 04, 2025 at 00:36 AM EDT Businesses can now mail multiple documents online with instant dispatch and live tracking
TYLER, TX, USA - OnlineCheckWriter.com Powered by Zil Money today launched its enhanced Document Mail App, designed to streamline the process of uploading, managing, and mailing documents. With this app, businesses can now send individual documents or bulk mailings instantly, eliminating the usual processing delay. The app is available for download on both iOS and Android platforms.
The Document Mail App offers an intuitive user interface, enabling businesses to upload multiple documents simultaneously, select recipients, and choose from trusted carriers like USPS and FedEx for delivery. Users can track their mailed documents and access detailed mailing statements, ensuring full visibility and control. Transparent pricing allows users to see the exact shipping costs before confirming their mailing, ensuring complete clarity. The app further incorporates advanced security features with encryption, safeguarding all sensitive data during transmission.
“By digitalizing each step of business operations, they can streamline workflows, reduce overhead, and accelerate growth,” said Sabeer Nelli, CEO of Zil Money Corporation. “Our new Document Mail App supports this transformation by simplifying document mailing, enabling faster communication, and freeing businesses to focus on what matters most—their growth and success.”
OnlineCheckWriter.com has been pivotal in delivering essential tools that businesses rely on to optimize their operations including check printing, ACH, international payments, virtual cards, payroll, and API integrations. The new Document Mail App strengthens this lineup by simplifying business communications.
About OnlineCheckWriter.com – Powered by Zil Money
OnlineCheckWriter.com – Powered by Zil Money is a trusted fintech innovator that bridges traditional banking with modern digital solutions. The platform maintains deep integrations with over 22,000 financial institutions, enabling seamless connectivity across diverse banking ecosystems. Committed to the highest security standards, continuous innovation and a customer-first approach, the platform is serving over 1 million business payment solutions.
